fields.name: nx
fields.description: Number of grid points in the x-direction.

fields.name: ny
fields.description: Number of grid points in the y-direction.

fields.name: Lx
fields.description: Physical domain size in x.

fields.name: Ly
fields.description: Physical domain size in y.

fields.name: dx
fields.description: Spatial step in x (Lx / nx).

fields.name: dy
fields.description: Spatial step in y (Ly / ny).

fields.name: barrier_y_phys
fields.description: Physical y-coordinate where barrier is placed.

fields.name: detector_y_phys
fields.description: Physical y-coordinate of the detector row.

fields.name: barrier_row
fields.description: Barrier row index, computed from physical coordinate.

fields.name: detector_row
fields.description: Detector row index, computed from physical coordinate.

fields.name: slit_width
fields.description: Number of grid columns spanned by each slit.

fields.name: slit_spacing
fields.description: Distance (in columns) between the two slits.

fields.name: center_x
fields.description: The x-center column index (middle of the domain).

fields.name: slit1_xstart
fields.description: Left edge of slit #1.

fields.name: slit1_xend
fields.description: Right edge of slit #1.

fields.name: slit2_xstart
fields.description: Left edge of slit #2.

fields.name: slit2_xend
fields.description: Right edge of slit #2.

fields.name: boundary_conditions
fields.description: Type of boundary condition at the grid edges.

fields.name: Matrix
fields.description: 8x8 unitary coin operator matrix.

fields.name: seed
fields.description: Random seed for reproducibility.

fields.name: UnitarityCheck
fields.description: Checks if Matrix * Matrix^â€  = I (tests unitarity).

fields.name: construction_method
fields.description: How the coin operator was generated.

fields.name: construction_params
fields.description: Parameters for the chosen coin operator method.

fields.name: src_y
fields.description: Y-center of the initial Gaussian wave packet.

fields.name: sigma_y
fields.description: Std. dev. of the Gaussian in y.

fields.name: psi_init
fields.description: Initial wavefunction: Gaussian in y, uniform across x and spin directions.

fields.name: kx
fields.description: Initial momentum in x.

fields.name: ky
fields.description: Initial momentum in y.

fields.name: psi_in
fields.description: Input wavefunction for the coin step.

fields.name: coin_matrix
fields.description: Coin operator to be applied.

fields.name: psi_out
fields.description: Applies the coin operator to each spin component.

fields.name: psi_in
fields.description: Input wavefunction for the spatial shift.

fields.name: offsets
fields.description: List of (dy,dx) offsets for each direction index (0..7).

fields.name: psi_out
fields.description: Rolls each direction's amplitude by the specified (dy,dx) offsets.

fields.name: psi_in
fields.description: Input wavefunction before barrier is applied.

fields.name: barrier_row
fields.description: Row index of the barrier.

fields.name: slit1_xstart
fields.description: Slit #1 start column.

fields.name: slit1_xend
fields.description: Slit #1 end column.

fields.name: slit2_xstart
fields.description: Slit #2 start column.

fields.name: slit2_xend
fields.description: Slit #2 end column.

fields.name: psi_out
fields.formula: APPLY_BARRIER(psi_in, barrier_row, slit1_xstart, slit1_xend, slit2_xstart, slit2_xend)
fields.description: Zero out barrier row except in the slit columns.

fields.name: psi_in
fields.description: Input wavefunction before measurement collapse at barrier.

fields.name: barrier_row
fields.description: Barrier row index (where measurement occurs).

fields.name: slit1_xstart
fields.description: Slit #1 start column.

fields.name: slit1_xend
fields.description: Slit #1 end column.

fields.name: slit2_xstart
fields.description: Slit #2 start column.

fields.name: slit2_xend
fields.description: Slit #2 end column.

fields.name: psi_out
fields.formula: COLLAPSE_BARRIER(psi_in, barrier_row, slit1_xstart, slit1_xend, slit2_xstart, slit2_xend)
fields.description: Implements a barrier measurement collapse: amplitude outside slits is lost.

fields.name: collapse_method
fields.description: Specifies the type of measurement collapse at the barrier.

fields.name: psi_in
fields.description: Wavefunction whose norm we want to compute.

fields.name: total_norm
fields.description: Computes the total probability norm: sum(|psi|^2).

fields.name: psi_in
fields.description: Wavefunction to extract the detector row from.

fields.name: detector_row
fields.description: Row index where the detector is located.

fields.name: row_amp
fields.description: Extracts the wavefunction's amplitude at the detector row.

fields.name: row_amp
fields.description: Detector row amplitude over x, with 8 spin directions.

fields.name: intensity_1d
fields.description: Sums |amplitude|^2 over spin directions, yielding intensity profile vs. x.

fields.name: steps_to_barrier
fields.description: Number of steps taken before potentially measuring at the barrier.

fields.name: steps_after_barrier
fields.description: Number of steps taken after the barrier event.

fields.name: collapse_barrier
fields.description: If true, measure/collapse at the barrier; otherwise let the wave pass.

fields.name: final_wavefunction
fields.description: Resulting wavefunction after the prescribed sequence of steps and optional barrier collapse.

fields.name: step_order
fields.description: Sequence in which steps are applied each iteration (e.g. ["CoinStep", "ShiftStep", "BarrierStep"]).

fields.name: global_seed
fields.description: Seed controlling randomness across all random components.

fields.name: y_start
fields.description: Start row of extended detector region.

fields.name: y_end
fields.description: End row of extended detector region.
